mapper.select: SELECT SUM(t.card_charge) AS total_charge, u.user_gender AS user_gender, DATE_FORMAT(t.payment_date, '%Y-%m') AS payment_month, CASE WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.user_birth) / 365) BETWEEN 70 AND 79 THEN '70대' ELSE '기타' END AS age_group FROM transaction t JOIN card_issued ci ON t.card_issued_id = ci.id JOIN user u ON u.id = ci.user_id GROUP BY payment_month, age_group, u.user_gender HAVING payment_month = #{paymentMonth}

SELECT s.business_type, SUM(t.card_charge) AS total_charge, DATE_FORMAT(t.payment_date, '%Y-%m') AS payment_month FROM transaction t JOIN store s ON t.store_id = s.id GROUP BY s.business_type, payment_month HAVING payment_month IN (#{paymentMonth}, #{paymentMonthLastYear})

SELECT UM(card_charge) AS total_charge, payment_date FROM transaction WHERE (payment_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND payment_date <= CURDATE()) OR (payment_date >= DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND payment_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) GROUP BY payment_date ORDER BY payment_date

SELECT (SELECT SUM(card_charge) FROM transaction WHERE payment_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01') ) AS this_year_total, (SELECT SUM(card_charge) FROM transaction WHERE payment_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AND payment_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ) AS last_year_total
